Show total or incremental values for cumulative fluid output

1 Click the Flowsheets button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Flowsheets.

2 Click Options. (It does not matter which flowsheet is selected because options apply to all flowsheets.)

3 Click Display incremental values for cumulative fluid output to show incremental values, or clear the check box to show total values.

4 Click Close.

5 When you are finished customizing flowsheets, click Close.
